trans-unit.source: Provides command related utility methods that register <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> objects for class owners and commands, add and remove command event handlers, and provides services for querying the status of a command.
trans-unit.target: Fornece comandos relacionados com os métodos de utilitário registarem <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> objetos para os proprietários de classe e comandos, adicionar e remover processadores de eventos de comando e fornece serviços para consultar o estado de um comando.

trans-unit.source: The CommandManager is responsible for managing routed commands.
trans-unit.target: O CommandManager é responsável pela gestão comandos encaminhados.

trans-unit.source: For more information about commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre commanding, consulte [descrição geral do Commanding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A> to register a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A>para registar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>a uma classe, por oposição a uma instância.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> to register an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>para registar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>a uma classe, por oposição a uma instância.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method forces the CommandManager to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A>método força CommandManager para aumentar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event informs a command source to query the command it is associated with to determine whether or not the command can execute.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>eventos informa uma origem de comando para consultar o comando que se encontra associado para determinar se é ou não pode executar o comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"></xref> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Anexa especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"> </xref> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"></xref> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Anexa especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"> </xref> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"></xref> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Anexa especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"> </xref> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"></xref> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Anexa especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"> </xref> para o elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager"></xref> to raise the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Força o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager"> </xref> para aumentar o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> only pays attention to certain conditions in determining when the command target has changed, such as change in keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>apenas pays atenção para determinadas condições determinar quando o destino do comando foi alterado, tais como a alteração no foco do teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>

trans-unit.source: In situations where the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> does not sufficiently determine a change in conditions that cause a command to not be able to execute, InvalidateRequerySuggested can be called to force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: Em situações onde a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>suficientemente não determinar uma alteração nas condições que fazer com que a não conseguir executar um comando, InvalidateRequerySuggested pode ser chamado para forçar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>para aumentar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>

trans-unit.source: Registers a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Regista um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref> com o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enables a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to be associated with a class instead than an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>estar associado uma classe em vez disso, a uma instância de uma classe.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: The class with which to register `commandBinding`.
trans-unit.target: A classe com o qual pretende registar `commandBinding`.
O enlace de comando para registar.

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Regista especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"> </xref> com o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enables an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to be associated with a type instead of an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite um <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>estar associado um tipo em vez de uma instância de uma classe.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>
O enlace de entrada para registar.

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"></xref> from the specified element.
Detaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"></xref> from the specified element.
Detaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler"></xref> from the specified element.
Detaches the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler"></xref> from the specified element.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager"></xref> detects conditions that might change the ability of a command to execute.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandManager"> </xref> Deteta as condições que poderão alterar a capacidade de um comando a executar.

trans-unit.source: Since this event is static, it will only hold onto the handler as a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez que este evento é estático, só irá manter para o processador como uma referência fraca.

trans-unit.source: Objects that listen for this event should keep a strong reference to their event handler to avoid it being garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Objetos que escutam para este evento devem ter uma referência segura para o respetivo processador de eventos para evitar que a ser recolhidos.

trans-unit.source: This can be accomplished by having a private field and assigning the handler as the value before or after attaching to this event.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ser conseguido com um campo privado e atribuir o processador como o valor antes ou depois de anexar a este evento.
